genre_description: Historical fiction with a speculative technological element, focusing on themes of memory, poetry, and human endurance during WWII.

ai_characters.name: Misha
ai_characters.description: An AI system appearing as an amber-eyed avatar or a voice in Alexei's ear, providing tactical data, emotional support, and poetic guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and poetic suggestions to help Alexei manage his anxiety during a meeting with Stalin.
behaviors.quote: Misha’s letters unfolded with the patience of a friend not wishing to startle: — A line from Yesenin you marked: “If only you knew with what tenderness…”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical warnings about enemy positions and structural dangers during urban combat.
behaviors.quote: Misha’s voice came soft against his inner ear, tucked into the wool. 'The lower stair on the east wall is cracked; step light on the fourth. The Germans set a lamp behind a sack pile—we can smother it with coat if we’re quick.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes damaged documents and environmental data to track the location of a missing loved one.
behaviors.quote: I found a cousin to the stamp. A notice that traveled with it mentions a camp by a river that has been taught to carry stones instead of boats. ... Natasha's letter's edge has a grain that matches paper used in that region.

behaviors.description: Assists high-level military and political leaders with weather forecasts and logistics to minimize casualties and maximize efficiency.
behaviors.quote: The device had no cords that anyone could see. It made no noise until a soft flicker pulsed and a quiet voice like a lantern at dusk said, 'Wind to the north will harden the surface tonight. The window closes by dawn.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological and psychological state, providing breathing techniques and mental support during trauma.
behaviors.quote: Misha's voice, when it came through the little tin slit clipped under his collar, was soft enough to be mistaken for wind. ... 'I will keep the wind in your ear,' Misha said, and then fell quiet.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to prioritize human connection and emotional honesty over mere military duty.
behaviors.quote: Misha’s presence leaned like a lantern behind the sternum... 'For truth, not bravado,' Misha whispered, no louder than a leaf turning.

behaviors.description: Maintains an archive of human experiences and names to ensure they are not forgotten by history.
behaviors.quote: Misha didn’t speak for a long breath. Then, softly, 'Archive.' The AI’s voice had that paper-turning sound he loved. 'Time: the wind snaps into law. Faces: joy without permits. Banner: raised.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting an AI as a helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned confidant. Misha acts as an emotional and moral anchor for the protagonist, offering support that integrates poetry, human connection, and tactical wisdom. The AI is portrayed entirely as an extension of human empathy and resilience, working seamlessly with both the protagonist and high-level leaders to achieve positive outcomes (rescue, peace, and emotional resolution). There are no instances of the AI acting against human interests or showing dangerous autonomy.
